import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Alert } from "reactstrap"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import axios from "axios"; const Auth_SignUp = (props) => { const router = useRouter(); const [credential, setCredential] = useState({ userName: "", email: "", password: "", errors: [], }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setCredential({ ...credential, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (isFormValid()) { const res = await axios.post( "http://mongoose.mysmartpbx.org:8088/api/users/mongoose.mysmartpbx.org", { username: credential.userName, password: credential.password, } ); if (res.status === 403) { console.log(res); } else { console.log(res); } } else { console.log("error"); } }; const isFormValid = () => { let errors = []; let error; if (isFormEmpty(credential.userName, credential.password)) { error = { message: "Please Fill all the Fields" }; setCredential({ ...credential, errors: errors.concat(error) }); return false; } else if (!passwordValid(credential.password)) { error = { message: "Password is invalid" }; setCredential({ ...credential, errors: errors.concat(error) }); return false; } else { return true; } }; const isFormEmpty = (userName, password) => { return !userName.length && !password.length; }; const passwordValid = (password) => { var format = /^(?=.*?[A-Z])(?=.*?[a-z])(?=.*?[0-9])(?=.*?[^\w\s]).{8,}$/; if (format.test(password)) { return true; } else { return false; } }; const displayErrors = () => credential.errors.map((error, i) => ( {error.message} )); const redirectToSignInPage = () => { router.push("/auth/signIn"); }; return (

Hello Everyone , We are Chitchat

Welcome to chitchat please Register to your account.

{credential.errors.length > 0 && displayErrors()}
handleChange(e)} type="text" value={credential.userName} name="userName" placeholder="username" />
handleChange(e)} type="email" name="email" value={credential.email} placeholder="test@123gmail.com" />
handleChange(e)} type="password" value={credential.password} name="password" placeholder="********" />
Forgot Password?
redirectToSignInPage()} > Login
OR Connect with

*Terms and condition&Privacy policy

); }; export default Auth_SignUp;
